Track compliance across your Azure Arc-enabled infrastructure

parameters.name: ResourceGroups
parameters.label: ðŸ—‚ï¸ Resource Groups
parameters.query:
resources
| where type in ("microsoft.hybridcompute/machines", "microsoft.azurearcdata/sqlserverinstances")
| summarize Count = count() by ResourceGroup = resourceGroup
| order by ResourceGroup asc
| project value = ResourceGroup, label = strcat(ResourceGroup, " (", Count, " resources)"), group = "Resource Groups"

content.query:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroups}) or '*' in ({ResourceGroups})
| where properties["licenseProfile"]["softwareAssurance"]["softwareAssuranceCustomer"] == true
| summarize Count = count()
content.title: ðŸ–¥ï¸ Arc Servers - Software Assurance Enabled

content.query:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroups}) or '*' in ({ResourceGroups})
| summarize 
    TotalServers = count(),
    SoftwareAssuranceEnabled = countif(properties["licenseProfile"]["softwareAssurance"]["softwareAssuranceCustomer"] == true)
| project Count = TotalServers - SoftwareAssuranceEnabled
content.title: ðŸ–¥ï¸ Arc Servers - Software Assurance Disabled

content.query:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.azurearcdata/sqlserverinstances"
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroups}) or '*' in ({ResourceGroups})
| where properties['licenseType'] == "Paid"
| summarize Count = count()
content.title: ðŸ“ˆ Arc SQL Servers - Software Assurance Enabled

content.query:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.azurearcdata/sqlserverinstances"
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroups}) or '*' in ({ResourceGroups})
| where properties['licenseType'] == "LicenseOnly"
| summarize Count = count()
content.title: ðŸ“ˆ Arc SQL Servers - Software Assurance Disabled

content.query:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroups}) or '*' in ({ResourceGroups})
| summarize 
    TotalServers = count(),
    SoftwareAssuranceEnabled = countif(properties["licenseProfile"]["softwareAssurance"]["softwareAssuranceCustomer"] == true)
| extend PercentageEnabled = iff(TotalServers > 0, round((SoftwareAssuranceEnabled * 100.0) / TotalServers, 1), 0.0)
| project Percentage = strcat(PercentageEnabled, "%")
content.title: ðŸ“Š Windows Server - SA Coverage %

content.query:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.azurearcdata/sqlserverinstances"
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroups}) or '*' in ({ResourceGroups})
| summarize 
    TotalServers = count(),
    SoftwareAssuranceEnabled = countif(properties['licenseType'] == "Paid")
| extend PercentageEnabled = iff(TotalServers > 0, round((SoftwareAssuranceEnabled * 100.0) / TotalServers, 1), 0.0)

---

ðŸ“‹ Server Details

Detailed view of all Arc-enabled servers and SQL instances with their licensing information

parameters.name: WindowsVersionFilter
parameters.label: ðŸªŸ Windows Server Version
parameters.query:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines" and properties.osName contains "Windows"
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroups}) or '*' in ({ResourceGroups})
| extend Version = tostring(properties.osSku)
| where isnotempty(Version)
| summarize Count = count() by Version
| order by Version asc
| project value = Version, label = strcat(Version, " (", Count, " servers)"), group = "Windows Versions"

parameters.name: SqlVersionFilter
parameters.label: ðŸ—ƒï¸ SQL Server Version
parameters.query:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.azurearcdata/sqlserverinstances"
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroups}) or '*' in ({ResourceGroups})
| extend Version = tostring(properties.version)
| where isnotempty(Version)
| summarize Count = count() by Version
| order by Version asc
| project value = Version, label = strcat(Version, " (", Count, " instances)"), group = "SQL Versions"

content.query:
resources
| where type in ("microsoft.hybridcompute/machines", "microsoft.azurearcdata/sqlserverinstances")
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroups}) or '*' in ({ResourceGroups})
| extend ServerName = name
| extend ServerType = case(
    type == "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines" and properties.osName contains "Windows", "Windows Server",
    type == "microsoft.azurearcdata/sqlserverinstances", "SQL Server",
    "Other"
)
| where ServerType != "Other"
| extend Version = case(
    ServerType == "Windows Server", tostring(properties.osSku),
    ServerType == "SQL Server", tostring(properties.version),
    ""
)
| extend SoftwareAssuranceEnabled = case(
    ServerType == "Windows Server", iff(properties["licenseProfile"]["softwareAssurance"]["softwareAssuranceCustomer"] == true, "Yes", "No"),
    ServerType == "SQL Server", iff(properties['licenseType'] == "Paid", "Yes", "No"),
    "Unknown"
)
| where ServerType in ({ServerTypeFilter}) or '*' in ({ServerTypeFilter})
| where ServerType != "Windows Server" or Version in ({WindowsVersionFilter}) or '*' in ({WindowsVersionFilter})
| where ServerType != "SQL Server" or Version in ({SqlVersionFilter}) or '*' in ({SqlVersionFilter})
| project ServerName, Version, SoftwareAssuranceEnabled, ServerType, ResourceGroup = resourceGroup, Location = location, SubscriptionId = subscriptionId
| order by ServerType asc, ServerName asc
content.title: Server Inventory with License Information

content.json:
### Summary Statistics

This dashboard provides an overview of your Arc-enabled infrastructure licensing compliance:

- **Software Assurance Enabled**: Servers with active Software Assurance
- **Software Assurance Disabled**: Servers without Software Assurance

> **Note**: Use the built-in table filter to focus on specific server types in the detailed view.

---

## ðŸ“š Documentation Links

### Enable Software Assurance

For servers showing as **Software Assurance Disabled**, use these guides to enable Software Assurance:

**SQL Server:**
[Modify SQL Server Configuration - Enable Software Assurance](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/sql-server/azure-arc/manage-configuration?view=sql-server-ver17&tabs=azure#modify-sql-server-configuration)

**Windows Server:**
[Windows Server Management Overview - Enrollment](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-arc/servers/windows-server-management-overview?tabs=portal#enrollment)

> ðŸ’¡ **Tip**: After enabling Software Assurance, it may take up to 24 hours for the changes to reflect in this dashboard.
